about_the_game:
SCP: Blackout's OST- Volume 1 includes 14 original songs. Most can be found hidden away in the game, or you can just come here! Written and composed by a variety of artists, mastered by Jory Stultz.

All profits go to the artists and the game.

Songs in Volume 1


1. Welcome to Site-50 | Lusitanian Deviant Records 3:02
2. Through the Mirror | Seasonal Suicide 4:38
3. The Breaking | Louis S. 3:09
4. Future Shock | Testsuo Asaki 2:35
5. No Way Out | Jory Stultz and Mike Paul 3:04
6. Obsolete | Sleepy 1:54
7. Where Are We | Zakinithos 2:20
8. Deal With It | SCP-DELP 3:14
9. A Way Out | Jory Stultz and Mike Paul 3:56
10. Say Goodbye | SCP-OSPA 2:52
11. Don't Stop | Zakinithos 1:12
12. Hybrid | Jory Stultz and Mike Paul 4:50
13. The Lost Church | Testsuo Asaki 1:40
14. Descent | Jory Stultz and Mike Paul 3:42

content_descriptors.notes: The full game has dead bodies, blood, and monsters.
